title: Red yeast rice supplement 'has the potential to cause' liver damage, doctors warn

title_detail.value: Red yeast rice supplement 'has the potential to cause' liver damage, doctors warn

summary: Red yeast rice supplement has the potential to cause liver damage, warn doctors after a 64-year-old woman developed acute liver injury after six weeks of taking the supplement.

summary_detail.value: Red yeast rice supplement has the potential to cause liver damage, warn doctors after a 64-year-old woman developed acute liver injury after six weeks of taking the supplement.
